languages.text: Пусть миры династии фон Валанциус и чисты от скверны, но вокруг притаилось еще множество врагов веры, и пилигримы Фолстоуна пылают фанатизмом! Они нуждаются в оружии и кораблях, и тот, кто дарует им эти святые инструменты, будет облечен частицей мощи Бога-Императора! Да начнется крестовый поход против скверны и язычества!

House von Valancius' worlds may be untouched by corruption, but many enemies of the faith are lurking all around, and the pilgrims of Foulstone are aflame with fanaticism! They need weapons and ships, and whoever gifts them these holy tools will be vested with a modicum of the God-Emperor's power! May the crusade against corruption and idolatry commence!
languages.original_text: Пусть миры династии фон Валанциус и чисты от скверны, но вокруг притаилось еще множество врагов веры, и пилигримы Фолстоуна пылают фанатизмом! Они нуждаются в оружии и кораблях, и тот, кто дарует им эти святые инструменты, будет облечен частицей мощи Бога-Императора! Да начнется крестовый поход против скверны и язычества!

They need weapons and ships, and whoever gifts them these holy tools will be vested with a modicum of the God-Emperor's power! May the crusade against corruption and idolatry commence!

languages.text: Los mundos de la casa von Valancius pueden estar libres de corrupción, pero los enemigos de la fe acechan en todos lados ¡y los peregrinos de Rocainmunda rezuman fanatismo! Necesitan armas y naves, ¡y quienquiera que les de estas herramientas sagradas gozará de la bendición del Dios Emperador! ¡Que comience la cruzada contra la corrupción y la idolatría!
languages.original_text: House von Valancius' worlds may be untouched by corruption, but many enemies of the faith are lurking all around, and the pilgrims of Foulstone are aflame with fanaticism! They need weapons and ships, and whoever gifts them these holy tools will be vested with a modicum of the God-Emperor's power! May the crusade against corruption and idolatry commence!

traits.locale_text: Los mundos de la casa von Valancius pueden estar libres de corrupción, pero los enemigos de la fe acechan en todos lados ¡y los peregrinos de Rocainmunda rezuman fanatismo! Necesitan armas y naves, ¡y quienquiera que les de estas herramientas sagradas gozará de la bendición del Dios Emperador! ¡Que comience la cruzada contra la corrupción y la idolatría!

languages.text: Les mondes appartenant à la maison von Valancius sont certes épargnés par la corruption, mais les ennemis de la foi rôdent en nombre et les pèlerins de Rochepeste sont animés d'un fanatisme enflammé ! Ils ont besoin d'armes et de vaisseaux, et quiconque leur octroiera ces outils sacrés recevra en retour une infime fraction du pouvoir de l'Empereur-Dieu ! Que la croisade contre la corruption et les fausses idoles commence !
languages.original_text: House von Valancius' worlds may be untouched by corruption, but many enemies of the faith are lurking all around, and the pilgrims of Foulstone are aflame with fanaticism! They need weapons and ships, and whoever gifts them these holy tools will be vested with a modicum of the God-Emperor's power! May the crusade against corruption and idolatry commence!

traits.locale_text: Les mondes appartenant à la maison von Valancius sont certes épargnés par la corruption, mais les ennemis de la foi rôdent en nombre et les pèlerins de Rochepeste sont animés d'un fanatisme enflammé ! Ils ont besoin d'armes et de vaisseaux, et quiconque leur octroiera ces outils sacrés recevra en retour une infime fraction du pouvoir de l'Empereur-Dieu ! Que la croisade contre la corruption et les fausses idoles commence !

languages.text: 冯·瓦兰修斯家族的世界或许还未遭到腐化染指，但信仰的敌人潜藏在暗处蠢蠢欲动，荒寂岩地的朝圣者已经沐浴在狂热的烈焰之中！他们需要武器，需要舰船。谁能为他们奉上这些神圣的工具，谁就将获得神皇赐予的力量！让这场远征立刻开始，剿灭一切腐化与伪神吧！
languages.original_text: House von Valancius' worlds may be untouched by corruption, but many enemies of the faith are lurking all around, and the pilgrims of Foulstone are aflame with fanaticism! They need weapons and ships, and whoever gifts them these holy tools will be vested with a modicum of the God-Emperor's power! May the crusade against corruption and idolatry commence!

traits.locale_text: 冯·瓦兰修斯家族的世界或许还未遭到腐化染指，但信仰的敌人潜藏在暗处蠢蠢欲动，荒寂岩地的朝圣者已经沐浴在狂热的烈焰之中！他们需要武器，需要舰船。谁能为他们奉上这些神圣的工具，谁就将获得神皇赐予的力量！让这场远征立刻开始，剿灭一切腐化与伪神吧！

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウス家の惑星は腐敗とは無縁かもしれないが、多くの信仰の敵が至る所に潜んでおり、ファウルストーンの巡礼者たちは狂信に燃えている！彼らには武器と船が必要だ。彼らにこれらの聖なる道具を贈りし者は、神帝陛下の力の一部を与えられるだろう！腐敗と偶像崇拝に対する聖戦が始まらんことを！
languages.original_text: House von Valancius' worlds may be untouched by corruption, but many enemies of the faith are lurking all around, and the pilgrims of Foulstone are aflame with fanaticism! They need weapons and ships, and whoever gifts them these holy tools will be vested with a modicum of the God-Emperor's power! May the crusade against corruption and idolatry commence!

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウス家の惑星は腐敗とは無縁かもしれないが、多くの信仰の敵が至る所に潜んでおり、ファウルストーンの巡礼者たちは狂信に燃えている！彼らには武器と船が必要だ。彼らにこれらの聖なる道具を贈りし者は、神帝陛下の力の一部を与えられるだろう！腐敗と偶像崇拝に対する聖戦が始まらんことを！

languages.text: Die Welten des Hauses Valancius mögen unberührt von Korruption sein, doch viele Feinde des Glaubens lauern überall, und die Pilger von Foulstone brennen vor Fanatismus! Sie brauchen Waffen und Schiffe, und wer auch immer ihnen diese heiligen Werkzeuge schenkt, wird mit einem kleinen Funken der Macht des Gottimperators belohnt! Möge der Kreuzzug gegen Korruption und Götzentum beginnen!
languages.original_text: House von Valancius' worlds may be untouched by corruption, but many enemies of the faith are lurking all around, and the pilgrims of Foulstone are aflame with fanaticism! They need weapons and ships, and whoever gifts them these holy tools will be vested with a modicum of the God-Emperor's power! May the crusade against corruption and idolatry commence!

traits.locale_text: Die Welten des Hauses Valancius mögen unberührt von Korruption sein, doch viele Feinde des Glaubens lauern überall, und die Pilger von Foulstone brennen vor Fanatismus! Sie brauchen Waffen und Schiffe, und wer auch immer ihnen diese heiligen Werkzeuge schenkt, wird mit einem kleinen Funken der Macht des Gottimperators belohnt! Möge der Kreuzzug gegen Korruption und Götzentum beginnen!

languages.text: Von Valancius Hanesi'nin dünyaları yozluktan etkilenmemiş olsa da din düşmanları dört bir yanı sarmış hâlde. Üstelik Menfurtaş'ın hacıları arasında fanatiklik coşmuş vaziyette! İhtiyaç duydukları kutsal silahları ve gemileri onlara armağan edecek olan kişi, Tanrı İmparator'un kudretinden bir nebze tatma şerefine kavuşacak! Yozluğa ve putperestliğe karşı başlasın cihadımız!
languages.original_text: House von Valancius' worlds may be untouched by corruption, but many enemies of the faith are lurking all around, and the pilgrims of Foulstone are aflame with fanaticism! They need weapons and ships, and whoever gifts them these holy tools will be vested with a modicum of the God-Emperor's power! May the crusade against corruption and idolatry commence!
